mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_board b, tbl_member m

select bno,title,content,b.regdate,viewcnt,username from tbl_board b, tbl_member m
order by bno desc, b.regdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (bno,title,content,writer) values ((select nvl(max(bno)+1,1) from tbl_board) ,#{title},#{content},#{writer})
mapper.update: update tbl_board set viewcnt=viewcnt+1 where bno=#{bno}
update tbl_board set title=#{title},content=#{content} where bno=#{bno}

choose.when: where b.writer=m.userid and ( username like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' )
